name: mdn-save-with-comment
title: MDN: Save With Comment Hotkey
description: A helpful add-on for MDN contributors which adds a hotkey that instantly scrolls to and focuses the revision comment edit box so you can comment and save your changes. The hotkey is Ctl-Alt-Shift-S on Linux and Windows or Cmd-Opt-Shift-S on Mac OS X.
author: Eric Shepherd <eshepherd@mozilla.com>
